sense.gloss: student taking (university) entrance exams while still enrolled in school, student who passed their university entrance exams on the first try

sdata.j: |↑現役|↑↓げんえき↓から↑引退↑↓いんたい↓した↑人↑↓ひと↓は↑足↑↓あし↓が↑遠↑↓とお↓のくものだ。
sdata.e: People rarely come to see you once you are retired.

sdata.j: |↑現役|↑↓げんえき↓を↑引退↑↓いんたい↓した↑後↑↓のち↓、テレサは↑孤児↑↓こじ↓の↑世話↑↓せわ↓に↑一身↑↓いっしん↓をささげた。
sdata.e: After retirement, Teresa devoted herself to caring for orphans.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑７０↑↓ななじゅっ↓↑歳↑↓さい↓だけどまだ|↑現役|↑↓げんえき↓です。
sdata.e: At seventy, he is still active.

sdata.j: ↑祖父↑↓そふ↓は↑90↑↓きゅうじゅっ↓↑歳↑↓さい↓ですが、まだ|↑現役|↑↓げんえき↓です。
sdata.e: My grandfather is 90 years old and is still very active.
